title: Altinn 3 Validation
description: Schema that describes the custom validation configuration for Altinn applications.

$schema.title: Schema
$schema.description: The schema that this file adheres to

oneOf.title: Reference to another validation
oneOf.description: A reference to another validation to extend from. The referenced validation must be defined in the same validation configuration file.

message.title: Validation message
message.description: The message to display when the validation fails.

condition.title: Expression returning a boolean value
condition.description: The expression must return a boolean value. The expression can contain references to other fields in the form.

severity.title: Severity
severity.description: The severity of the validation message.

showImmediately.title: Show immediately
showImmediately.description: If true, the validation message will be shown immediately when the condition is true. If false, it will be shown when expression validations are normally shown.

ref.title: Reference to another validation
ref.description: A reference to another validation to extend from. The referenced validation must be defined in the same validation configuration file.
